definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: ADF test is the most common method of unit root test.
sentences.chinese: ADF檢驗是實際中最常用的單位根檢驗之一。

sentences.english: And introduced the unit root test and the random process that can often be used in economy.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了單位根檢驗以及經濟中常用的隨機過程。

sentences.english: Thus, testing unit root in seasonal time series is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 這樣對季節性時間序列進行單位根檢驗是很必要的。

sentences.english: New developments in unit root test and cointegration tests are covered.
sentences.chinese: 在單位根檢驗和協整檢驗的新發展都包括在內。
